On-the-fly man pages for Solaris

Man page for try to find it

WWW

FAQ
a general overview of the WWW, what it is, how things work. Available from the TU Vienna

Perl & CGI

So what exactly is CGI then?
Marc Hedlund has a useful FAQ about CGI
CGI.pm
a perl5 module to make writing CGI scripts oh-so-easy
perl5
for actually writing CGI scripts
cgiC
although perl is a lot easier to use for CGI scripting, this library is supported on our server and is there if you really need to use C for CGI programs.
GD.pm
a Perl 5 module to use Boutells gd graphic library. A simple but efficient tool to create GIFs on the fly.
WWW/CGI Security FAQ
Makes a difference, believe me.

Databases

MiniSQL, (main site)
Quick, simple and efficient for small applications, example code available from your favourite webmaster.

Harvest

FAQ
What is it and what is it not.
User Manual
The gory details. Also available as PostScript
